task_name: Create Course Covers and Visual Materials with AI Tools
context: to design professional course covers, thumbnails, and marketing visuals for educational content using AI image generation
description: Professional course visual materials creation using AI image generation tools (Midjourney, Leonardo AI, ChatGPT-5). Includes designing course covers, module thumbnails, social media banners, and promotional graphics. Follows brand guidelines and educational design best practices. Supports revenue-generating courses and marketing campaigns with high-quality visuals at scale.
estimated_duration: 2.5 hours (30 min planning + 1.5 hours generation + 30 min refinement)
tools_required: TOL-224 (Leonardo AI) for controlled design generation
TOL-225 (ChatGPT-5) for prompt engineering and refinement
Figma or Photoshop for final adjustments
Canva for layout and text overlays
success_criteria: Consistent visual style across all materials
Files delivered in required formats (PNG, JPG, SVG)
Source files archived for future modifications

steps.name: Review brief and gather design requirements
outputs: Course topic and key themes identified

steps.name: Develop AI prompts and visual concepts
outputs: Mood board created with reference images

steps.name: Generate initial designs with Midjourney
outputs: Upscaled versions created for selected images

steps.name: Refine with Leonardo AI for control
outputs: Color palette refined to match brand

checklist.item: Course brief reviewed and requirements documented

roi_metrics.time_savings: 5x faster than traditional design (2.5 hours vs 12+ hours)
roi_metrics.cost_efficiency: 90% cheaper than hiring freelance designers ($20 AI credits vs $200+ designer fee)
roi_metrics.scalability: Can produce 5+ variations in same time as 1 manual design

responsibility_name: create course covers, design course materials, generate thumbnails, create carousels
